snippet.title: Dungeons: The Eye of Draconus Official Release Trailer - Gleobryn
snippet.description:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/303510/

Description Today, 8/11/2014 at 5pm 
Dungeons: The Eye of Draconus is now available on Steam!

Thus begins our most epic quest yet, rapid patching and Linux / Mac porting.  It's been a long 6+ year journey, but we've finally made it past the finish line.  We may do a video retrospective at some point post release.  All of us have gambled our savings and futures on this project, so please tell your friends to pickup a copy.  We have some free DLC planned in the future and of course Episodes 2 and 3 will be made available sometime in the months ahead (assuming we are not all dead and/or bankrupt).

Signed,
William A. McDonald
